mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message( msg_title, msg_src_id, src_msg_id, msg_type_id, msg_imprt_id, msg_class_id, msg_digest, msg_content, msg_attachment, appr_state, pub_user_id, pub_time, appr_time )VALUES ( #{msg_title}, #{msg_src_id}, #{src_msg_id}, #{msg_type_id}, #{msg_imprt_id}, #{msg_class_id}, #{msg_digest}, #{msg_content}, #{msg_attachment}, #{appr_state}, #{pub_user_id}, #{pub_time}, #{appr_time} )
mapper.select: SELECT met.msg_id,met.msg_title,met.src_msg_id,met.pub_user_id,met.pub_time,met.msg_type_id,met.msg_src_id,met.msg_digest,met.msg_content,met.msg_class_id,met.appr_user_id,met.msg_attachment,met.appr_state,met.appr_time,met.msg_src_name,met.msg_src_url,met.msg_class_name,su.user_name apprname FROM (SELECT mew.msg_id,mew.msg_title,mew.src_msg_id,mew.pub_user_id,mew.pub_time,mew.msg_type_id,mew.msg_src_id,mew.msg_digest,mew.msg_content,mew.msg_class_id,mew.appr_user_id,mew.msg_attachment,mew.appr_state,mew.appr_time,mew.msg_src_name,mew.msg_src_url,mc.msg_class_name FROM (SELECT me.msg_id,me.msg_title,me.src_msg_id,me.pub_user_id,me.pub_time,me.msg_type_id,me.msg_src_id,me.msg_digest,me.msg_content,me.msg_class_id,me.appr_user_id,me.msg_attachment,me.appr_state,me.appr_time,ms.msg_src_name,ms.msg_src_url FROM msg_source ms LEFT join message me on me.msg_src_id = ms.msg_src_id ) mew LEFT JOIN msg_classify mc ON mew.msg_class_id = mc.msg_class_id)met LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON met.appr_user_id = su.user_id
SELECT MAX(msg_id) FROM message WHERE 1=1

mapper.update: UPDATE portaldb.message SET msg_title= #{msg_title}, msg_class_id= #{msg_class_id}, msg_digest= #{msg_digest}, msg_content= #{msg_content}, msg_attachment= #{msg_attachment}, msg_type_id = #{msg_type_id}, pub_time= #{pub_time}, appr_state= #{appr_state}, appr_time= #{appr_time}, pub_user_id=#{pub_user_id} WHERE msg_id=#{msg_id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.tag_type_id,b.tag_type_name,GROUP_CONCAT(tag_id,':',tag_text) tag_text FROM (SELECT t.tag_type_id,t.tag_type_name,tt.tag_text,tt.tag_id FROM tag_type t left join tags tt on t.tag_type_id = tt.tag_type_id where t.tag_type_id !='' ) b GROUP BY b.tag_type_name
SELECT DISTINCT mt.msg_id FROM portaldb.msg_tag mt WHERE tag_id =#{tag_id}
